pisubscript𝑝𝑖p_{i}italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, p~jsubscript~𝑝𝑗\widetilde{p}_{j}over~ start_ARG italic_p end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT Density functions of arm-level and key term-level reward distributions Pisubscript𝑃𝑖P_{i}italic_P start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and P~jsubscript~𝑃𝑗\widetilde{P}_{j}over~ start_ARG italic_P end_ARG start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, respectively.
references: Table 1 summarizes the notations used through the main paper and the appendix.
